alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 2:28AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...ICY TRAVEL POSSIBLE NEAR AND NORTH OF A FITCHBURG TO LAWRENCE LINE TO THE NEW HAMPSHIRE BORDER VERY EARLY THIS MORNING... Winds were shifting to the north allowing temperatures to drop back into the 30 to 32 degree range...mainly north of a Fitchburg to Lawrence line very early this morning. Rain that was still falling may begin to freeze on some untreated surfaces...particularly bridges and overpasses. Roads that appear wet may actually contain black ice...so drive with caution early this morning. Precipitation may briefly change to sleet and snow before things wind down near daybreak. A dusting to an additional half inch of snow/sleet may fall in this region.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex
